publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-633# Alex Neil: Non-numeric Fingerprintingâ€”That the Parliament expresses concern at the introduction of non-numeric fingerprinting evidence by the Scottish Criminal Record Office, its implications for the success rate of convictions and the potential consequential increase in the legal aid budget and considers that the Scottish Executive should review this policy on a cross-departmental basis prior to its implementation.

S2M-633# Alex Neil: Non-numeric Fingerprinting-That the Parliament expresses concern at the introduction of non-numeric fingerprinting evidence by the Scottish Criminal Record Office, its implications for the success rate of convictions and the potential consequential increase in the legal aid budget and considers that the Scottish Executive should review this policy on a cross-departmental basis prior to its implementation.
S2M-633# Non-numeric Fingerprinting (lodged on 20 November 2003) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-633# Non-numeric Fingerprinting (lodged on 20 November 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-633# Non-numeric Fingerprinting (lodged on 20 November 2003) Alasdair Morgan*
S2M-633# Non-numeric Fingerprinting (lodged on 20 November 2003) Christine Grahame*
